patthana4.7:1.1.pli: Akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:2.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:4.1.pli: Kusalaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:5.1.pli: Akusalaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:6.1.pli: Abyākataṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:7.1.pli: Kusalaṃ nadassanena pahātabbañca abyākataṃ nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:8.1.pli: Akusalaṃ nadassanena pahātabbañca abyākataṃ nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:9.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:11.1.pli: Kusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo kusalassa nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:12.1.pli: Akusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo akusalassa nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:13.1.pli: Abyākato nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo abyākatassa nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:14.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:16.1.pli: Akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:17.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:19.1.pli: Kusalaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:20.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.7:21.1.pli: Akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:22.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:24.1.pli: Kusalaṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:25.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:27.1.pli: Akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:28.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:30.1.pli: Kusalaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:31.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:33.1.pli: Kusalaṃ savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:34.1.pli: Akusalaṃ savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:35.1.pli: Abyākataṃ savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:36.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ, avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:38.1.pli: Kusalo savitakko dhammo kusalassa savitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.7:39.1.pli: Akusalo savitakko dhammo akusalassa savitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.7:40.1.pli: Abyākato savitakko dhammo abyākatassa savitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.7:41.1.pli: Kusalo savitakko dhammo kusalassa savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:42.1.pli: Akusalo savitakko dhammo akusalassa savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:43.1.pli: Abyākato savitakko dhammo abyākatassa savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:44.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:46.1.pli: Kusalaṃ avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:47.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ, avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:49.1.pli: Kusalo avitakko dhammo kusalassa avitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:50.1.pli: Abyākato avitakko dhammo abyākatassa avitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:51.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye cattāri, jhāne magge pañca, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate dasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:53.1.pli: Kusalaṃ savicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo savicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Kusalasavitakkasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.7:54.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:55.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:56.1.pli: Abyākataṃ sappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:57.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:59.1.pli: Kusalo sappītiko dhammo kusalassa sappītikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.7:60.1.pli: Akusalo sappītiko dhammo akusalassa sappītikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.7:61.1.pli: Abyākato sappītiko dhammo abyākatassa sappītikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:62.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā …pe… samanantare satta, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:63.1.pli: Kusalaṃ appītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo appītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:65.1.pli: Abyākataṃ appītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato appītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:68.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:70.1.pli: Kusalo appītiko dhammo kusalassa appītikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:71.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:73.1.pli: Kusalaṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:74.1.pli: Kusalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kāmāvacaro ca abyākato kāmāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:75.1.pli: Akusalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:76.1.pli: Abyākataṃ kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:78.1.pli: Akusalaṃ kāmāvacarañca abyākataṃ kāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:79.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:81.1.pli: Kusalo kāmāvacaro dhammo kusalassa kāmāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:82.1.pli: Akusalo kāmāvacaro dhammo kusalassa kāmāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:83.1.pli: Abyākato kāmāvacaro dhammo abyākatassa kāmāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:84.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:91.1.pli: Abyākato nakāmāvacaro dhammo abyākatassa nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.7:92.1.pli: Kusalo nakāmāvacaro dhammo kusalassa nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo nakāmāvacaro dhammo abyākatassa nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.7:93.1.pli: Abyākato nakāmāvacaro dhammo abyākatassa nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Abyākato nakāmāvacaro dhammo kusalassa nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.7:94.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane dve, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:96.1.pli: Kusalaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:97.1.pli: Abyākataṃ rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:98.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:100.1.pli: Kusalaṃ narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:105.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.7:106.1.pli: Kusalo narūpāvacaro dhammo kusalassa narūpāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:108.1.pli: Abyākato narūpāvacaro dhammo abyākatassa narūpāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:109.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:111.1.pli: Kusalaṃ arūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo arūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:112.1.pli: Abyākataṃ arūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato arūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:113.1.pli: Kusalaṃ naarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Rūpāvacaradukasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.7:116.1.pli: Abyākataṃ pariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:117.1.pli: Kusalaṃ pariyāpannañca abyākataṃ pariyāpannañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:118.1.pli: Akusalaṃ pariyāpannañca abyākataṃ pariyāpannañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:119.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:121.1.pli: Kusalo pariyāpanno dhammo kusalassa pariyāpannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:122.1.pli: Akusalo pariyāpanno dhammo akusalassa pariyāpannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:123.1.pli: Abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo abyākatassa pariyāpannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:124.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.7:125.1.pli: Kusalaṃ apariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo apariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:131.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… upanissaye cattāri …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:140.1.pli: Akusalaṃ aniyyānikañca abyākataṃ aniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:141.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:143.1.pli: Kusalaṃ niyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:144.1.pli: Akusalaṃ niyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:145.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.7:146.1.pli: Kusalaṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:147.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.7:148.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:149.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:150.1.pli: Abyākataṃ sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:151.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sauttarañca abyākataṃ sauttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:152.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sauttarañca abyākataṃ sauttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:153.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.7:154.1.pli: Kusalo sauttaro dhammo kusalassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:155.1.pli: Akusalo sauttaro dhammo akusalassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:156.1.pli: Abyākato sauttaro dhammo abyākatassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:157.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:158.1.pli: Kusalaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:159.1.pli: Abyākataṃ anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:160.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ, avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:162.1.pli: Kusalo anuttaro dhammo kusalassa anuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.7:163.1.pli: Abyākato anuttaro dhammo abyākatassa anuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.7:164.1.pli: Abyākato anuttaro dhammo abyākatassa anuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.7:165.1.pli: Abyākato anuttaro dhammo kusalassa anuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:166.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:168.1.pli: Akusalaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:171.1.pli: Kusalaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:172.1.pli: Abyākataṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:173.1.pli: Kusalaṃ araṇañca abyākataṃ araṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:174.1.pli: Kusalaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo araṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana4.7:175.1.pli: Abyākataṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:176.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:178.1.pli: Kusalo araṇo dhammo kusalassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.7:179.1.pli: Abyākato araṇo dhammo abyākatassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.7:180.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
